hero.description: At our furniture e-store, we don't just sell furniture — we craft experiences that transform houses into homes, enhance your living spaces, and reflect your unique style. Our story is driven by passion, quality craftsmanship, and customer satisfaction.

missionVision.title: Mission, Vision & Core Values
missionVision.subtitle: We combine timeless craftsmanship, premium materials, and contemporary design to create furniture that transforms your living spaces into beautiful, comfortable homes.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide every home with exceptional furniture that combines style, comfort, and affordability, making quality living accessible to all.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the most trusted furniture e-store globally, transforming living spaces with innovative designs and sustainable craftsmanship.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction are at the core of everything we do. We craft with integrity, passion, and attention to detail.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Our Furniture Store?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: We combine exceptional craftsmanship, contemporary design, and sustainable practices to deliver furniture that transforms your living spaces.

premiumQuality.title: Premium Quality Craftsmanship
premiumQuality.description: Every piece is crafted with precision using premium materials, ensuring durability, comfort, and timeless elegance.

wideSelection.title: Wide Selection of Styles
wideSelection.description: From modern minimalist to classic traditional, we offer diverse furniture styles to match every taste and home aesthetic.

secureDelivery.title: Secure & Fast Delivery
secureDelivery.description: Your furniture is carefully packaged and delivered safely to your doorstep with full tracking and insurance coverage.

customization.title: Customization Options
customization.description: Personalize your furniture with custom fabrics, finishes, and configurations to perfectly suit your space and preferences.

bestValue.title: Best Value Guarantee
bestValue.description: We offer competitive pricing without compromising quality, ensuring you get the best value for premium furniture.

certified.title: Certified & Eco-Friendly
certified.description: Our furniture meets international quality standards and is crafted using sustainable, eco-friendly materials and processes.

hero.description: Have an idea, question, or just want to say hi? We'd love to hear from you. Drop us a message and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

footer.description: Premium furniture for modern living spaces. Designed with comfort and style in mind.
footer.companyDescription: Premium furniture for modern living spaces. Designed with comfort and style in mind.
